name: Switched to a sole application (app 1)
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

You have ended your joint application ((isDivorce??for divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership)). Your ((partner)) has been notified by email.

They have not been given a reason so you may want to contact them to explain, if it's safe to do so.  

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: You have ended your joint ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
